rules_text:
When Civic Coronation enters the battlefield, return target creature card with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard to your hand.
At the beginning of your upkeep, if you control at least two more creatures than any opponent, you take imperium. [i](Creatures you cast enter the battlefield with an extra +1/+1 counter. You lose imperium at the end of your turn if you didn’t attack or cast a creature spell.)[/i]
